summary: A collegian (Shahid Kapoor) woos a beautiful girl, then falls in love with his childhood friend (Amrita Rao).
cast: Shahid Kapoor|Amrita Rao|Shenaz Treasury|Vishal Malhotra|Kapil Jhaveri|Shabhir|Deepti Gujral|Soundarya|Yash Tonk|Damandeep|Satish Shah|Neelima Azim|Vivek Vaswani|Omung Kumar|Akbar Sami|Anang Desai|Upasna Singh|Preeti Koppikar|Himanshi|Priya Sampat|Tanas Pavri|Rachael Rebecca|Sachin Singh|Jamima|Niloufer Turel|Lata Sabharwal|Donna|Sadique Noor|Micky Dhamejani|Raj Mayur Parikh|Gaurav Sharma|Shivani Joshi|Dimpy|Nitin Arora|Himanshi Choudhry
title: Ishq Vishk
